meanings.sent1: The motored car was very fast.
meanings.sent2: The boat was motored and glided smoothly across the water.
meanings.sent3: The motored bike zoomed past us with a loud roar.
meanings.sent4: The motored lawnmower hummed as it effortlessly cut the grass.
meanings.sent5: The motored skateboard whizzed down the hill, thrilling the rider.

meanings.sent1: We took a motored bus to the city.

meanings.sent4: The motored scooter zipped through the crowded streets.
meanings.sent5: The motored car smoothly navigated the winding roads of the countryside.

meanings.sent1: The motored washing machine made laundry day much easier.
meanings.sent2: The motored elevator carried us to the top floor of the building.
meanings.sent3: The motored fan kept the room cool on hot summer days.
